solution.linktext: KB 3042439: Where can I get support on my pre–installed applications
RSC'den Microsoft İş Ortağı Ağı Yardımı Alma

level.title: Submit an incident
level.description: When you submit an incident online, a technical support representative will contact you within one business day.
